original_text: While Hadad was living in Egypt, he heard the news that King David had died. Joab, the leader of David's army, was also dead by this time. So Hadad said to Pharaoh, ‘Please let me return to my own country.’
korean_text: 하닷이 애굽에 있어서 다윗이 그의 조상들과 함께 잔 것과 군대 지휘관 요압이 죽은 것을 듣고 바로에게 아뢰되 나를 보내어 내 고국으로 가게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: While Hadad was living in Egypt
Joab, the leader of David's army
was also dead by this time
Please let me return to my own country
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 제 나라로 돌아가도록 허락해 주십시오
